verses.verse: וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> had occurred רָעָב֙ <WH7458> And there was a famine בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִלְּבַד֙ <WH905> beside הָרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> famine הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> the first אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> had occurred בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> that was in the days אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> of Abraham וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <WH1980> went יִצְחָ֛ק <WH3327> And Isaac אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲבִימֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH40> unto Abimelech מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> of the Philistines גְּרָֽרָה׃ <WH1642> unto Gerar

וַיֵּרָ֤א <WH7200> appeared אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> unto him and said אַל־ <WH408> not תֵּרֵ֣ד <WH3381> Go not down מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <WH4714> into Egypt שְׁכֹ֣ן <WH7931> dwell בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> of which אֹמַ֥ר <WH559> which I shall tell אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

גּ֚וּר <WH1481> Sojourn בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> in this land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וְאֶֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become עִמְּךָ֖ <WH5973> you וַאֲבָרְכֶ֑ךָּ <WH1288> and I will be with thee and will bless כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְךָ֣ וּֽלְזַרְעֲךָ֗ <WH2233> thee for unto thee and unto thy seed אֶתֵּן֙ <WH5414> I will give אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָֽאֲרָצֹ֣ת <WH776> countries הָאֵ֔ל <WH411> all these וַהֲקִֽמֹתִי֙ <WH6965> and I will perform אֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׁבֻעָ֔ה <WH7621> the oath אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֖עְתִּי <WH7650> which I sware לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> unto Abraham אָבִֽיךָ׃ <WH1> thy father

וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֤י <WH7235> to multiply אֶֽת־ <WH853> זַרְעֲךָ֙ <WH2233> thy seed כְּכוֹכְבֵ֣י <WH3556> as the stars הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְנָתַתִּ֣י <WH5414> and will give לְזַרְעֲךָ֔ <WH2233> unto thy seed אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאֲרָצֹ֖ת <WH776> countries הָאֵ֑ל <WH411> all these וְהִתְבָּרֲכ֣וּ <WH1288> be blessed בְזַרְעֲךָ֔ <WH2233> and in thy seed כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all גּוֹיֵ֥י <WH1471> shall all the nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

עֵ֕קֶב <WH6118> Because אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after שָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> obeyed אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> that Abraham בְּקֹלִ֑י <WH6963> my voice וַיִּשְׁמֹר֙ <WH8104> and kept מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֔י <WH4931> my charge מִצְוֹתַ֖י <WH4687> my commandments חֻקּוֹתַ֥י <WH2708> my statutes וְתוֹרֹתָֽי׃ <WH8451> and my laws
וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> dwelt יִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> And Isaac בִּגְרָֽר׃ <WH1642> in Gerar

וַֽיִּשְׁאֲל֞וּ <WH7592> asked אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> the men הַמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> of the place לְאִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> [him] of his wife וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and he said אֲחֹ֣תִי <WH269> She [is] my sister הִ֑וא <WH1931> he כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יָרֵא֙ <WH3372> for he feared לֵאמֹ֣ר <WH559> to say אִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH802> [She is] my wife פֶּן־ <WH6435> might יַֽהַרְגֻ֜נִי <WH2026> should kill אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> the men הַמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> of the place עַל־ <WH5921> account רִבְקָ֔ה <WH7259> me for Rebekah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for טוֹבַ֥ת <WH2896> because she [was] fair מַרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> to look upon הִֽיא׃ <WH1931> It

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came כִּ֣י <WH3588> when אָֽרְכוּ־ <WH748> And it came to pass when he had been there a long ל֥וֹ שָׁם֙ <WH8033> had been there הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> time וַיַּשְׁקֵ֗ף <WH8259> looked out אֲבִימֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH40> that Abimelech מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines בְּעַ֖ד <WH1157> at הַֽחַלּ֑וֹן <WH2474> a window וַיַּ֗רְא <WH7200> and saw וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold יִצְחָק֙ <WH3327> and behold Isaac מְצַחֵ֔ק <WH6711> [was] sporting אֵ֖ת <WH853> רִבְקָ֥ה <WH7259> with Rebekah אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <WH802> his wife

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called אֲבִימֶ֜לֶךְ <WH40> And Abimelech לְיִצְחָ֗ק <WH3327> Isaac וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said אַ֣ךְ <WH389> Behold of a surety הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold אִשְׁתְּךָ֙ <WH802> she [is] thy wife הִ֔וא <WH1931> he וְאֵ֥יךְ <WH349> How אָמַ֖רְתָּ <WH559> and how saidst אֲחֹ֣תִי <WH269> other הִ֑וא <WH1931> he וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about יִצְחָ֔ק <WH3327> Isaac כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because אָמַ֔רְתִּי <WH559> unto him Because I said פֶּן־ <WH6435> might אָמ֖וּת <WH4191> Lest I die עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> account

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <WH40> And Abimelech מַה־ <WH4100> What זֹּ֖את <WH2063> you עָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> What [is] this thou hast done לָּ֑נוּ כִּ֠מְעַט <WH4592> might lightly שָׁכַ֞ב <WH7901> have lien אַחַ֤ד <WH259> unto us? one הָעָם֙ <WH5971> of the people אֶת־ <WH854> with אִשְׁתֶּ֔ךָ <WH802> with thy wife וְהֵבֵאתָ֥ <WH935> and thou shouldest have brought עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> and אָשָֽׁם׃ <WH817> guiltiness

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> charged אֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <WH40> And Abimelech אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> all [his] people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הַנֹּגֵ֜עַ <WH5060> He that toucheth בָּאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> this man הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> this וּבְאִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> or his wife מ֥וֹת <WH4191> shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> be put to death

וַיִּזְרַ֤ע <WH2232> sowed יִצְחָק֙ <WH3327> Then Isaac בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> in that land הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> the same וַיִּמְצָ֛א <WH4672> and received בַּשָּׁנָ֥ה <WH8141> in the same year הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> the same מֵאָ֣ה <WH3967> hundred שְׁעָרִ֑ים <WH8180> hundredfold וַֽיְבָרֲכֵ֖הוּ <WH1288> blessed יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> and the LORD

וַיִּגְדַּ֖ל <WH1431> waxed great הָאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> And the man וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> forward הָלוֹךְ֙ <WH1980> and continued וְגָדֵ֔ל <WH1431> great עַ֥ד <WH5704> until כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָדַ֖ל <WH1431> became מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> very

וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> had ל֤וֹ מִקְנֵה־ <WH4735> For he had possession צֹאן֙ <WH6629> of flocks וּמִקְנֵ֣ה <WH4735> and possession בָקָ֔ר <WH1241> of herds וַעֲבֻדָּ֖ה <WH5657> of servants רַבָּ֑ה <WH7227> and great store וַיְקַנְא֥וּ <WH7065> envied אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> and the Philistines

וְכָל־ <WH3605> now all הַבְּאֵרֹ֗ת <WH875> For all the wells אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which חָֽפְרוּ֙ <WH2658> had digged עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> servants אָבִ֔יו <WH1> which his father's בִּימֵ֖י <WH3117> in the days אַבְרָהָ֣ם <WH85> of Abraham אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father סִתְּמ֣וּם <WH5640> had stopped פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> the Philistines וַיְמַלְא֖וּם <WH4390> them and filled עָפָֽר׃ <WH6083> them with earth

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אֲבִימֶ֖לֶךְ <WH40> And Abimelech אֶל־ <WH413> to יִצְחָ֑ק <WH3327> unto Isaac לֵ֚ךְ <WH1980> Go מֵֽעִמָּ֔נוּ <WH5973> with כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָצַֽמְתָּ־ <WH6105> mightier מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> from us for thou art much

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> departed מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there יִצְחָ֑ק <WH3327> And Isaac וַיִּ֥חַן <WH2583> thence and pitched his tent בְּנַֽחַל־ <WH5158> in the valley גְּרָ֖ר <WH1642> of Gerar וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיָּ֨שָׁב <WH7725> again יִצְחָ֜ק <WH3327> And Isaac וַיַּחְפֹּ֣ר ׀ <WH2658> digged אֶת־ <WH853> בְּאֵרֹ֣ת <WH875> the wells הַמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> of water אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> by which חָֽפְרוּ֙ <WH2658> which they had digged בִּימֵי֙ <WH3117> in the days אַבְרָהָ֣ם <WH85> of Abraham אָבִ֔יו <WH1> his father וַיְסַתְּמ֣וּם <WH5640> had stopped פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> for the Philistines אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> them after מ֣וֹת <WH4194> the death אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> of Abraham וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> and he called לָהֶן֙ שֵׁמ֔וֹת <WH8034> their names כַּשֵּׁמֹ֕ת <WH8034> after the names אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which קָרָ֥א <WH7121> had called לָהֶ֖ן אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father

וַיַּחְפְּר֥וּ <WH2658> digged עַבְדֵֽי־ <WH5650> servants יִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> And Isaac's בַּנָּ֑חַל <WH5158> in the valley וַיִּ֨מְצְאוּ־ <WH4672> and found שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there בְּאֵ֖ר <WH875> there a well מַ֥יִם <WH4325> water חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of springing

וַיָּרִ֜יבוּ <WH7378> did strive רֹעֵ֣י <WH7473> shipherd גְרָ֗ר <WH1642> of Gerar עִם־ <WH5973> with רֹעֵ֥י <WH7473> shipherd יִצְחָ֛ק <WH3327> with Isaac's לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> saying לָ֣נוּ הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> The water וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> [is] ours and he called שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> the name הַבְּאֵר֙ <WH875> of the well עֵ֔שֶׂק <WH6230> Esek כִּ֥י <WH3588> because הִֽתְעַשְּׂק֖וּ <WH6229> because they strove עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> they

וַֽיַּחְפְּרוּ֙ <WH2658> And they digged בְּאֵ֣ר <WH875> well אַחֶ֔רֶת <WH312> another וַיָּרִ֖יבוּ <WH7378> and strove גַּם־ <WH1571> too עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> over וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> for that also and he called שְׁמָ֖הּ <WH8034> the name of it שִׂטְנָֽה׃ <WH7856> Sitnah

וַיַּעְתֵּ֣ק <WH6275> And he removed מִשָּׁ֗ם <WH8033> there וַיַּחְפֹּר֙ <WH2658> from thence and digged בְּאֵ֣ר <WH875> well אַחֶ֔רֶת <WH312> another וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not רָב֖וּ <WH7378> and for that they strove עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> over וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> not and he called שְׁמָהּ֙ <WH8034> the name of it רְחֹב֔וֹת <WH7344> Rehoboth וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and he said כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For עַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> For now הִרְחִ֧יב <WH7337> hath made room יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD לָ֖נוּ וּפָרִ֥ינוּ <WH6509> for us and we shall be fruitful בָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land
וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> And he went up מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there בְּאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <WH884> from thence to Beersheba

וַיֵּרָ֨א <WH7200> appeared אֵלָ֤יו <WH413> about יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> unto him the same night הַה֔וּא <WH1931> the same וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said אָנֹכִ֕י <WH595> I אֱלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> I [am] the God אַבְרָהָ֣ם <WH85> of Abraham אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> thy father אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָא֙ <WH3372> fear כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אִתְּךָ֣ <WH854> not for I [am] with אָנֹ֔כִי <WH595> I וּבֵֽרַכְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH1288> thee and will bless וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֣י <WH7235> thee and multiply אֶֽת־ <WH853> זַרְעֲךָ֔ <WH2233> thy seed בַּעֲב֖וּר <WH5668> the sake אַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> Abraham's עַבְדִּֽי׃ <WH5650> for my servant

וַיִּ֧בֶן <WH1129> And he builded שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there מִזְבֵּ֗חַ <WH4196> an altar וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> there and called בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> upon the name יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֶּט־ <WH5186> and pitched שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there אָהֳל֑וֹ <WH168> his tent וַיִּכְרוּ־ <WH3738> digged שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> and there עַבְדֵי־ <WH5650> servants יִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> there and there Isaac's בְּאֵֽר׃ <WH875> a well

וַאֲבִימֶ֕לֶךְ <WH40> Then Abimelech הָלַ֥ךְ <WH1980> went אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to him מִגְּרָ֑ר <WH1642> to him from Gerar וַאֲחֻזַּת֙ <WH276> and Ahuzzath מֵֽרֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH4828> one of his friends וּפִיכֹ֖ל <WH6369> and Phichol שַׂר־ <WH8269> the chief captain צְבָאֽוֹ׃ <WH6635> of his army
